name: emplolyee-managemnet-system
description: Create 2 collections:  1. Companies  2. Employees     -Each Employee should belong to a particular company (implement the join logic)      -Companies collection should have a field called 𝐧𝐮𝐦𝐛𝐞𝐫_𝐨𝐟_𝐞𝐦𝐩𝐥. This field should be incremented whenever a new employee is added to the particular Company
